ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_rainbow] Re: New to Rodcet Nife
ygData.msgSnippet: Wolvie... thanks for holding my Barbarians bag last night.... you can t imagine how much he appreciated a helping hand. Check out my site if you re interested
ygData.messageBody:
Wolvie...
thanks for holding my Barbarians bag last night.... you can't imagine how
much he appreciated a helping hand.

Check out my site if you're interested in me... or getting jewelry made on
Rodcet Nife.

hugz
Rich
a.k.a Aethyra D'Lusionall (lvl 45 ench)
Khelvan Degreez (lvl 40 mage)
and Hagadorr the Barbarian Shaman (who's level doesn't matter yet)

http://members.home.net/moonbear7/

-----Original Message-----
From: Jamie [mailto:jdincinci@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 14, 2001 9:54 PM
To: EQ_rainbow@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Re: New to Rodcet Nife


Yes, Armande is correct...the guild is definitely still around and
doing well. I also moved from Mithaniel Marr to Rodcet Nife. It's
been a lot of fun and the members are great. I haven't missed my
Mithaniel Marr characters a bit.

Give me a tell if you see me online, i'd be glad to help.

Wolveran Swiftspirit
Mystic Alliance


--- In EQ_rainbow@y..., "Rob Ruger" <aethercub@b...> wrote:
> The Mystic alliance (www.mysticalliance.com) does indeed exist, and
there
> are around 60 members (about 40 of which are semi to fully active).
I fall
> into the inactive category. (on a hiatus for various reasons, not
the least
> of which is Anarchy Online) We are on the Rodcet NIfe server, and
the web
> page should give you an idea of us. (There's a fine, active message
board
> there). As far as officers, they'd be Snapdragyn, Ompa, Taren,
Gwynap,
> Gunarr, Aethyra, Trinic, Marri, Gaiwan, Vargyr, Andelyve, Gaybriel,
Leta, or
> Armande (if I'm on...still have some time left on the current pay
> period...stop in now and then to say hi). If I left out any
officers, I'm
> sorry. Anyone else in the guild would be happy to talk to ya, but
those are
> the people who can do the inviting. :-) So we're not by any means
dead.
>
> Peas,
> Rob
> Armande V'lu
